metadata.name: Unicum Real Estate
metadata.symbol: Piece of Heaven - Real World Assets
metadata.subtitle: 17.771m2 of land with house
metadata.title: Piece of Heaven on Earth - Real Estate in Julian Alps Europe
metadata.description:
Buy Yourself a piece of Heaven on Earth.    

 

By buying the NFT you ll get the once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to buy yourself a piece of Heaven located in Triglav National Park in the Julian Alps in Slovenia, Europe.  

The extreme rarity of this property lies in the fact that is located in Triglav National park and no new properties can be built as now allowed by law.

Location of the property:  The location of the property is in Europe, Republic of Slovenia – Triglav national park. More about TNP:  https://www.tnp.si/en/visit/  

 

The property "Piece of Heaven" includes: 

Land: 17.771 m2:    Plot 73/1 KO Trenta Leva 2203 Slovenia, Europe

House 62 m2 :          Plot 73/1 KO Trenta Leva 2203 Slovenia, Europe  

 

The house has 70m2 and can accommodate 4 people. On the property, there is a cable car and diesel-electric generator.  The property is located 0,7 miles (1 km) away from the main road and can be reached only by foot. For transportation of the goods and food, there is a cable car.  

 

Please consult the box files for the Real Estate documentation video and pictures: 

https://app.box.com/s/m7z8rp1qtil4xa3zbh13ebinthhylfc8  

The owner of the NFT associated with this property will have the right of ownership of the mentioned property and house.

What do you get when buying the NFT: 

  • Certificate of property ownership/tokenization (which is digitally signed by the legal owner of the Real Estate)
  • The right to use, rent or sell the property ( for example you could create 52 NFT with a different ID each representing the 52 weeks of the year. And for example connect the NFT to the right to use the Real Estate in the week of the year of NFT token ID for let's say 5 years.)   

After the payment, you'll receive the Original Certificate of Property ownership/tokenization. Feel free to ask any questions.
